name: Space Docker VR
description:
"There's no drag in space" -- Realistic physics means that 'docking' becomes a skillful task, as you learn to master your momentum.

Intuitive Virtual Cockpit Controls

New Procedural Levels Generated weekly

Master Your Craft

Features

  • Career Mode: authored missions with unique twists to train and test your docking abilities
  • Additional Procedural Content: Weekly missions, as well as 'on-demand' random jobs
  • Race Mode: push your flying skills to the max
  • Re-bindable Virtual Cockpit Controls (*HOTAS/Controller support coming soon)
  • Compete via Friends/Global Leaderboards
  • Unlockable Steam Achievements
